channel.title: The Church at Brook Hills Video Podcast
channel.itunes:author: The Church at Brook Hills
channel.itunes:summary: Teaching from The Church at Brook Hills in Birmingham, Alabama. Join us in loving Jesus, growing in Jesus, and making disciples of Jesus.
channel.description: Teaching from The Church at Brook Hills in Birmingham, Alabama. Join us in loving Jesus, growing in Jesus, and making disciples of Jesus.
